评论详情: Should not purchase clothes this way because the picture is deceiving!

I’m normally a size 2xl but sized up to a 3xl. It’s not as oversized as I would’ve liked. The problem with plus sizes is they only get wider but not longer. It’s still going to work for my concert outfit I’m planning but I do wish it was a little bit longer. Other than that I love it and the colors match the pictures

*Edit* the elastic in one sleeve broke the second time wearing it. So now the sleeves look even more weird with one wide and one narrow because of the broken elastic. This shirt is super cute and the material is so soft. I got a large and the sleeves we just barely long enough. However, after the 1st wash the material on the front of the sleeve shrunk significantly leaving the front of the sleeve several inches too short, but the material on the back of the sleeve did not shrink making the sleeves lay weird now. I washed it exactly as the instructions said and did not put it in the dryer. Super disappointed because this shirt is absolutely adorable.
I really like this blouse! It's of great quality and is true to size. The colors are vibrant.
Runs large.

评论用户: Trisha size xl. Size up, runs small
评论详情: Blouse is cute, lightweight,  flowey, I wish i gotten in way smaller size. I know it's supposed to be kinda wavy but it was overly waves, think a size smaller would been better.
The size SMALL looks to big more like a medium) it's a gift. Hope I'm wrong Don't like the material.
Love it, and fits like it should.

This top definitely runs large, and while I was expecting bright red as in the photo, it's more of a Campbell's tomato soup red. But super crazy comfortable and I really do love it once I got over the color disappointment. LOL
My wife loves it. Very nice fabric, looks great and fits true to size.
Very flattering lots of compliments on it I got the Halloween one sexy, but fun washed well air dried
This top looks just like the online picture. It is very pretty. The fabric is fairly thin and it’s a little large, so I would have ordered a size down. Definitely hang dry it after washing.
Fit and fabric is wonderful!
The blouse arrived fast - in time for my event, and it looks like the picture in the advertisement.  It goes well with my 70s outfit, and it's very soft and comfortable. Thank you.

评论概述: Very cute, neck is pretty wide
评论详情: This is very cute and comfortable, the neck is a little wide than I would like. I like that the bottom of the sleeves are cotton and only the top of the sleeve is sheer.
Runs very large. I ordered small.

I’m a big fan of fun sleeves of any type. This shirt is super cute, comfy and flattering. It’s great for work! I have it in 2 different colors. I didn’t notice and shrinking and I just wash and dry with everything else.
Very cheap looking. Bad fit
It's in the top of my fall clothes rotation.
Love the colors on this  top
I paid $36 for the top and it looked like it wasn’t even worth $5.  Ugly colors . Cheap fabric. Poorly made.
Perfect fit, soft, comfortable, nice quality. Would get one in every color. If there were more.
the sleeve design is only partial on the sleeve, it looks silly . It also took weeks and weeks to arrive
This shirt is comfy and pretty!
Wire this to church today and got lots of compliments. Comfy and very pretty fall top!
Very thin. Very easily wrinkled.
Pretty top. Soft material. Very comfortable.
Cute shirt and nice fit
Cute flowy top. Fits great and is soft and comfortable. I ordered an XL which is my typical size and it fits great.

This shirt is really cute. The sleeves are a nice accent to the black body. Fit is slightly big, so if you want a hanging baggy fit order normal size, for a bit smaller more tapered fit, size down. I always get compliments when wearing it!

I got this shirt in another color and loved it. Sadly this Halloween one is awful. The material is cheap and the black doesn't match the rest of the shirt. They won't let me return it, even though it is brand new, never worn, with tags on.

I love this top! So much so that I bought it in FOUR colors! The sleeves are flowy and roomy and the material is smooth and soft. Great for fall weather!!! The base color of the shirt is vibrant and the texture of a nicer soft tshirt. I haven’t noticed any issues with wrinkles. Glad I made this purchase!!!
Love it
Love this shirt, I am 5'4" 225 and ordered a 2xl, fits great!  Love it

评论概述: Pattern is only a stripe on the sleeve, not the entire sleeve
评论详情: I bought the orange shirt.  Love how it drapes and the material is thin without feeling cheap. It falls nicely.  My only issue is that the pattern on the arm is only a stripe down the arm not the entire sleeve. Which looking back at the photo I can see. However, I didn't notice when I was purchasing. It isn't a deal breaker ... But I would have loved the shirt more if the pattern had been the entire sleeve.
This didn’t look like the picture. The colors in the sleeves were terrible. I didn’t even bother to try it on.
Got compliments first time wearing it from people I knew and didn't know
First day I wore it I got 2 compliments.  super cute, comfy and made well
Wrinkles easy but very comfortable.
Nice material, true to fit, pretty print already got compliments ♥️
Good quality and washes well
I love the material, I am going to buy it in more colors!
Shirt fits as expected. Quality is good for price. Great choice for fall as the sleeves are a thin material

I followed directions on the label, washed it in cold delicate, and when I went to hang it up to dry, there’s a little hole right in the center of the shirt. If the seller is reading this, please reach out to me.

评论概述: Exactly what I was hoping for
评论详情: I love how this boho-inspo top fits. The draping of the fabric and the playful pattern of the sleeves suit me very well. I recommend washing cold and hanging to dry, just in case anyone wants to know, The colors are staying true and there's been no compromising in the fabrics involved.  So if you're wondering if you'll like it? You probably will.
This top is cheaply made. Not impressed.

Perfect top for jeans, well made!

The fabric is nice and not cheap like I have out there.  Good fit also.
Love the fit and the way the sleeves  move on the arm all the colors  are neat good price good quality  👌
Comfy cute and confident in this
Sizing is off

It’s very cute, the shirt fits true to size. I didn’t realize the sheer fabric on the sleeve was only on one side of the sleeve. At first I wasn’t sure I’d like it however, once I put it on I did like it. The sleeves are baggy and not fitted, which I prefer. The shirt fabric is thin more like jersey. The length is not too long or too short but long enough to cover my stomach when I lift my arms.
Looks super nice. Fits very comfortable great with a skirt or jeans . Happy with west and cost

So many compliments!! It really is the cutest!!  I would love to post pictures, but I don’t know how!!I ordered in every version!!! So cute!!!
Fit as described and was very comfortable! Great for the price. Looked like the pic.
I bought the brown shirt with brown mesh sleeves. Beautifully made and soft feel. Will buy same top in a different color. Very pleased!
This is a true size and fits perfectly. I like the fabric and the colors. Definitely I am going to buy another one.
A whimsical, fun, boho-styled shirt that is true to sizing.  I ordered a large & it fit perfect!  I'm 5'9.  Looks great with jeans or shorts! Good quality shirt.

评论概述: It does come larger in size.

I plan on wearing the shirt to a party this weekend. It is very flattering.
Very comfortable material.

评论概述: Love the feel and quality of the fabric and lace-like sleeves.
评论详情: Ordered an extra large and it was too long. I wanted to wear as a shirt vs a tunic. A trip in the washer with watm water shrunk it just enough for a perfect fit. Color held great in the wash and was as represented.
Love this blouse.  Colors are beautiful.  Comfortable fit.
It completely succeeded my expectations, love the light material and I feel so comfortable in this shirt. It is very pretty!!
I blight these for my best friend and she is in love with how flowy and comfortable the shirts are. She had no issues with sizing and it's been apart of her work wardrobe. She was very pleased
this blouse is great, the only thing I would suggest is to hang dry because it wrinkles very easily.

I loved how light weight this top is on my body, the sleeve fabric might be a little weird if worn in the summer. It was a tiny bit too long but nothing terrible. I would have kept it but the color looked terrible on me. The orange was more of an orange-brown. I might try in a different color.
I love this shirt so much I got another one in a different color. Fits perfectly, very comfortable and thin enough to wear in warmer weather. Would definitely buy again!
The color was NO WAY near the red color pictured. If you want burgundy then this is the shirt for you. Not red!
This shirt is just as it is pictured and colors are spot on .
This top is great, fits really well and while lightweight it isn't see through. It's also got a nice fell to the fabric.
Love the colors and fit.
It is a nice weight, the color is true and hangs nice. The fit is also true. Will buy again!

评论概述: Ok top- sleeves are awkward- see top description
评论详情: I bought this top to wear to work. The main body of the top is fine. The sleeves are not nearly long enough (the picture shows them to almost sit on your wrist). The sleeves come way up on my arm- like 3/4 length sleeves. I have average length arms. I ended up just pushing them up my arm. Probably would not buy this style sleeve top again. NOTE the top description says 'lace short sleeve'. But the top itself and what the model is wearing is long sleeve and not lace.
This is a perfect top for early spring.  It is long sleeved, but airy.  Can't wait for it to get warm enough to wear it!
Fits comfortably and most importantly washes well.  Keeps shape. Would recommend this blouse
This is slightly peach/pink in color. It goes perfectly with the pink pants I ordered.
Good quality, pretty and true to size
Definitely one of my favorite shirts. I normally wear a large/xl. I sized up one and it’s perfect!
Love the colors

First time I ordered something happened and I didn't receive it. They were very quick to replace it the next day and it's a super cute blouse! Looks like the picture. I got the rust color blouse w patterned sleeves.
Loved the sleeves- very flattering top!
I don't care for this blouse kinda generic and ugly

I like this shirt even more when I tried it on.  I thought it was cute when i bought it but the colors are so much pretty when you see it. Flattering shirt.  I’m getting more in different colors & designs.  You won’t be disappointed I don’t think.
